Posts.Content:
i had a scare in my right breast and they even did a ultrasound and said it was ok, then a year and five months later i end up with breast cancer in the left breast. i wonder could they have gotten the breast mixed up. i don't know, but lady's please give yourselves self exams. i injured my left breast and left it alone and come to find out i had breast cancer. now stage iv w/liver to mets and bones. i had all the surgeries, lupectomy, radation and only isolated tumor cells in lymph nodes and it spread within 1 year. now on chemo to keep me going
i also was taking femara but it supposidly did not work even though my tumor was estrogen positive. if you ever have any ackes and pains after breast cancer, make sure you get a mri or pet scan asap by your doctor. insist on it do not wai like i did for 4 months
Posts.Title: Stage IV Breast Cancer Survivors?

Posts.Content:
I have been reading about
 vaccines they have out now for Her 2 positive and Genetech company just came out with a new drug for Her 2. If you need more info let me know.
Posts.Title: Stage IV Breast Cancer Survivors?

Posts.Content: When you find out you have liver mets and your oncologist won't have them burnt out or frozen go to a liver specialist on your own because if you don't have to many this procedure does work. Also Cancer Treatment centers of America does chemo right into liver. I know someone getting this done and it keeps the tumor or tumors down. Again you can only have a few tumors. Just saying!
Posts.Title: Stage IV Breast Cancer Survivors?

Posts.Content: taking new drug that has not been approved by fda yet but will be soon. it is call "Afinitor" taken with a hormone pill, which i am taking aromison but it has been approved by the fda. Afinitor gives me bad mouth sores so I am off of it for awhile to get them to heal taking 10mg and doctor want me to go on 5mg. there is a clinical trial in Kentucky that has been going on for 4 years and it shows stabilization in stage 4 breast cancer. Out of 30 patients, 25 are still with us. anyone else know of this medicin
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content: Do you know how many liver tumors she has because if she only has 1 or 2 and they are not really big she can get the procedure where they stick a hot rod in the tumor or freeze the tumors. Have her ask her doctor. I think they did not do it on me because my cancer went to my bones also. Do not wait because I know a girl that had it done and it never came back. Also Cancer treatment centers of America does chemo right into the liver.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer metastasized to liver stage 4

Posts.Content: Just wanted all to know that after getting treated for breast cancer there are alot of clinical trials out there for vaccines to keep the cancer from coming back. If you have any kind of pains in your body, please get it checked out by your doctor right away. Do not wait. Breast cancer can come back. Hugs.
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content:
Have been searching and searching these vaccines we have been hearing about
 on the news.  Come to find out there has been several clinical trials on vaccines back since 2006.  Just found a girl on Breast Cancer . org forum that flew to St. Louis were I live to be in a clinical trial at Washington University for metastic breast cancer.  She said she is NED now.  She had the vaccine and chemo Arimidex.  Don't you think if she was cleared up in 6 months like that the FDA would have approved these treatments right away.  I sure don't understand the FDA.
Posts.Title: stage iv breast cancer

Posts.Content: haven't been on in awhile. having problem with kidney stone and failed last chemo. mets to liver increasing. good news I will be starting a new treatment that is not quite approved by FDA but you can get it approved through your onco if needed right away. It is called Afinitor which is a pill you dissolve in water and then you take the hormone pill with it called Aromosin. Not sure if I have it spelt correctly. I am ER positive and this is suppose to stabilize your disease for a medial 11 months. I hope it works for 11 years. Don't know what is going to happen but in the mean time I am going to try this and have some vaccine clinical trials hoping I can get into in my schedule. anyone else doing this treatment.
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content: Hi, Barkboys,
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content: thank you for the information
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content:
haven't been on in awhile.  just been living life while taking chemo.  insurance would not approve pet scan. said i needed a ct scan and bone scan since I haven't had them in over a year.  everything seems to be about
 the same except liver tumor shrank from 4.2 to 2.8 and found another small liver lession.  bones are stable showing small amounts of healing and I don't know about
 some spots that showed up on pet scan because ct sees things differently.  like comparing apples to oranges.  i was taking abraxane and carboplatin but had an allergic reaction to the carboplatin and had to go to emergency room.  I was ok.  They are changing it to a sister drug.  I was diagnosed with breast metastic cancer on 7/12/11.  originally had bc on 12/09.  I had a tumor 3cm in left breast and only isolated tumor cells in sentinol node.  all other 17 nodes were clear.  er positive.
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content: Liz, thank you and keep me posted on your condition. I will tell you something. I had the choice to have chemo before surgery to shrink my tumor and I wish I would have went that way just so I knew what chemo worked on my cancer. Just a thought.
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content: great stories.
Posts.Title: stage iv breast cancer

Posts.Content: i go to the doctor tomorrow to find out if the 2 masses in my liver are cancer from the breast. what keeps me going is my family and friends and when i am alone i say the lords prayer and it makes me feel better. look at the bright side everyone, which i am trying to do. they have this medicine approved by the fda which is suppose to be released at the end of the year for prostate cancer. supposidly the cancer cells attack the other cancer cells and they are suppose to be working on the breast cancer next, then other cancers, but also my friends brother had a very rare cancer that only 100 people have in the united states and he went to a clinical trail in pennsylvania which i will find out exactly where and let you know and the took the cancer out of his femur, replaced it with a rod, and they are giving him this medicine that is actually shrinking his cancer. what a miracle. they are coming out with new stuff all the time. if anyone is ever told by a doctor that they can't do anything anymore, look for these clinical trails. hope and pray this decision does not pass our way. praying everyday for women in our condition that we will be cured by the lord and the accomplishments of medicine.
Posts.Title: Stage IV Breast Cancer with spots on spine and ribs

Posts.Content:
relax, you only have stage 1 breast cancer, that is terrific, does stage 1 mean your lymph nodes weren't involved right or were they and how big was your tumor.  anyway, make sure you ask for a bone scan and a mri just from experience, my cancer may have came back to my spine and i did have a bone scan and it was clear when i was first diagnosed, but never an mri.  i would of liked to know if my mri showed something a year and a half ago.  also along your healing, please if you have any suspicious pain at all, get it checked out.  i let mine go for about
 3 months and now i don't know what it is.  i will find out tomorrow when i get my pet scan.  good luck to your liver, i will pray for you
Posts.Title: sent home from 1st chemo tretment

Posts.Content: so you had spots in your bone marrow and they went away.  are you ok now.  i see my doctor wednesday.  how could the spots go away
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content: hey barkboy, my back really hurts, that's how i found the trouble and i was tested for the brc and they said it was not the inherited gene
Posts.Title: (No Subject)

Posts.Content: i have a friend at work that got shingles too. she had breast cancer with 10 lymph nodes infected and she is doing well. i found out wednesday my breast cancer spread to my ribs, pelvis, femor and two spots on my liver. they say i need to retire and i am going to be on chemo for the rest of my life. glad your ok. if you have any info on my condition please let me know. my breast cancer is estrogen positive 100% and very small projesterone positive

Posts.Content: how long have you been living with this, sorry i keep thinking of things to ask.

Posts.Content: is cowgirl out there.  how are you doing. i am in st. louis missouri and was recently diagnosed with bone mets and 2 liver mets.  my oncologist wants to start chemo.  where are you getting treatment.  does anyone out there know of the best place to get treated for this.  i read on the internet that back in 1988 at the sarah cannan research inst. in tennessee that women with the same condition had received a stem cell transplant along with chemo and they are still living.  waiting for phone call back from sarah cannan institute
